scripts.dev: sam build; sam local start-api --env-vars local.env.json;
scripts.deployStack: sam build; sam deploy --config-file samconfig.toml --config-env $ENVIRONMENT --profile restauranto-deploy; npm run postDeployStack
scripts.deployDev: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-dev ENVIRONMENT=dev; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployStaging: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-staging ENVIRONMENT=staging; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployProd: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-prod ENVIRONMENT=prod; npm run deployStack
scripts.deployProdCICD: export STACK_NAME=restauranto-prod; sam build; sam deploy --config-file samconfig.toml --config-env prod
